name: ICY BOX
description: RaidSonic's ICY BOX is a European-based company that specializes in innovative storage solutions. With a wide range of products that include docking stations, external data storage, hubs, adapters, and workplace solutions, ICY BOX has become increasingly popular across 43 European countries, Australia, and the USA. The company places great importance on quality, using high-quality materials and strict testing procedures to exceed industry standards. With excellent customer service, ICY BOX is committed to providing its customers with the best possible experience.
